kimononet.geo.GeoVelocity

    Package Description
    kimononet.geo

    • Uses of GeoVelocity in kimononet.geo

      Methods in kimononet.geo that return GeoVelocity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GeoVelocity RandomWaypointGeoDevice.getVelocity()
      With probability specified by RandomWaypointGeoDevice.turnProbability, updates the bearing direction by up to RandomWaypointGeoDevice.maxTurn and returns the current velocity.
      GeoVelocity GeoDevice.getVelocity() 
      GeoVelocity DefaultGeoDevice.getVelocity() 
      Methods in kimononet.geo with parameters of type GeoVelocity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GeoLocation GeoLocation.move(GeoVelocity velocity, int currentTime)
      Given a velocity and a current time, the method returns a new location.
      Constructors in kimononet.geo with parameters of type GeoVelocity 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomWaypointGeoDevice(GeoLocation currentLocation, GeoVelocity velocity, TimeProvider timeProvider, double maxTurn, double turnProbability)
      Creates a new GPS enabled device emulator based on the Random Waypoint Model .
